ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): entity = widget.Entity
if (entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value != 1) and (widget.View.Commands["Delete"] != None): widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False if (entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 3) and (widget.View.Commands["Edit"] != None): widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False if widget.View.Commands["CMD_CALCULARPROJETO"] != None: widget.View.Commands["CMD_CALCULARPROJETO"].Visible = entity.EhGestorProjetos
if widget.View.Commands["CMD_LIBERARAPROVACAO"] != None: widget.View.Commands["CMD_LIBERARAPROVACAO"].Visible =(entity.Fields["GRUPOASSINATURAS"].ToString() != "") and (entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 1) and (entity.Fields["APROVARCALCULO"] ) and ((entity.Fields["STATUSAPROVACAO"] != None and entity.Fields["STATUSAPROVACAO"].Value != 1) or (entity.Fields["STATUSAPROVACAO"] == None))
